scripts.clean: npm run pre-clean && npm run post-clean
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run pre-build && npm run post-build
scripts.post-build: npm run post-clean && BABEL_ENV=post-build babel ./source --copy-files --ignore ./source/library --out-dir . && rm -f ./process/logs/nessa.webpack.log && webpack
scripts.test: npm run test-library && npm run test-www
scripts.test-library: rm -rf ./coverage ./process/logs/nessa.mocha.log && npm run build && istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --dir ./coverage -- --bail --timeout 0 ./tests
scripts.test-www: rm -rf ./process/logs/nessa.www.log && npm run build && mocha-phantomjs --bail --hooks ./resources/hooks.js --ignore-resource-errors --path ./node_modules/.bin/phantomjs http://localhost:8082/www/test.html
scripts.run: rm -rf ./process/logs/nessa.server.log && npm run build && node server/index.js
scripts.debug-run: rm -rf ./process/logs/nessa.server.log && npm run build && node-debug server/index.js
